title: Devon Ke Dev Mahadev (1-425 episodes) hindi
description:
Year: 2011
Country: India
Genre: Spiritual Drama)
Duration: 140 hours (425 episodes each 20 minutes)
Language: Hindi
Translate: no translate
Director: Nikhil Sinha, Manish Singh
Cast: Mohit Raina (Lord Shiva), Mouni Roy (Sati), Sonarika Bhadoria (Parvati), Radha Krishna Dutt (Lord Brahma), Saurabh Raj Jain (Lord Vishnu), Ragini Dubey (Shri Lakshmi).

Quality: SiteRip from 640x360 to 1280x720
Video: MPEG; H.26x
Audio: Audio.Codec: AAC, 125 Kibit/s, 48,0 KGhz

Description: This is the story of Lord Shiva and Goddess Shakti. It is an elaborated narration of Shiv and Shakti's separation and union, their journeys together, and how that affected and shaped the world. The story presently narrates how Goddess Shakti's human incarnation Sati, grand daughter of Lord Brahma and daughter of Prajapati Daksha (a staunch devotee of Lord Vishnu) and Queen Prasuti is reunited with Shiva after Shakti was separated from him for the benefit of the universe. The show is presumed to follow with Sati's reincarnation as Goddess Parvati, daughter of mountain-king Himalaya and Queen Maina and younger sibling of Prince Mainak and Goddess Ganga. The show will then portray her union with her chosen lord Mahadev and how they came together never to be separated again. One of the most enchanting and intriguing tales of love, this story is credited as the first love story of the universe
